live blog

Installation Mass of Pope Francis

The Fisherman's Ring was placed Pope Francis's finger by Cardinal Angelo Sodano. Stefano Rellandini/Reuters
Faithful filled St. Peter's Square at the Vatican for today's Mass. Andrew Medichini/Associated Press
Pope Francis rode in an open-top vehicle to St. Peter's Square. Giampiero Sposito/Reuters
A colorful flurry of flags greeted Pope Francis as he arrived in St. Peter's Square. Stefano Rellandini/Reuters
Pope Francis approached priests with an Argentine flag as he arrived in St. Peter's Square. Stefano Rellandini/Reuters
Pope Francis reached out to touch a child as he arrived to his inauguration Mass. Michael Sohn/Associated Press
A banner with the image of Pope Francis was displayed in St. Peter's Square earlier today. Alessandro Bianchi/Reuters
Pope Francis waved to the faithful as he arrived in St. Peter's Square. Gregorio Borgia/Associated Press
Nuns ran in Saint Peter's Square to snag a good vantage point before the inaugural Mass. Max Rossi/Reuters
Ceremonial chalices containing hosts were prepared before Pope Francis' installation Mass. Alessandro Bianchi/Reuters
